about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: If you can see that the roadway up ahead is covered by heavy smoke, you should:

about.name: If you can see that the roadway up ahead is covered by heavy smoke, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you can see that the roadway up ahead is covered by heavy smoke, you should: | If you can see that the roadway up ahead is covered by heavy smoke, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you notice that the road ahead is covered by heavy smoke, reduce your speed immediately, drive as far as possible to the right, and stop off the roadway. Only then should you determine if it is safe for you to continue. Remember that certain kinds of smoke can irritate your eyes and lungs or even kill you.

suggestedAnswer.text: Turn on your four-way flashers and continue.

comment.text: Turn on your four-way flashers and continue.

suggestedAnswer.text: Reduce your speed, move as far to the right as possible, and stop off the roadway.

comment.text: Reduce your speed, move as far to the right as possible, and stop off the roadway.

suggestedAnswer.text: Turn on your high beam headlights and continue.

comment.text: Turn on your high beam headlights and continue.

acceptedAnswer.text: Reduce your speed, move as far to the right as possible, and stop off the roadway.

comment.text: Reduce your speed, move as far to the right as possible, and stop off the roadway.

answerExplanation.text: If you notice that the road ahead is covered by heavy smoke, reduce your speed immediately, drive as far as possible to the right, and stop off the roadway. Only then should you determine if it is safe for you to continue. Remember that certain kinds of smoke can irritate your eyes and lungs or even kill you.

comment.text: If you can see that the roadway up ahead is covered by heavy smoke, you should: | If you notice that the road ahead is covered by heavy smoke, reduce your speed immediately, drive as far as possible to the right, and stop off the roadway. Only then should you determine if it is safe for you to continue. Remember that certain kinds of smoke can irritate your eyes and lungs or even kill you.

hasPart.name: When entering an interstate highway, you should:

about.name: When entering an interstate highway, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When entering an interstate highway, you should: | When entering an interstate highway, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Rather than stopping (as you would when entering other roads), you must use the merging or acceleration lane to speed up and smoothly merge with fast-moving traffic already on the interstate.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop, check for cars, and enter when safe.

comment.text: Stop, check for cars, and enter when safe.

suggestedAnswer.text: Check for cars and reduce your speed to 25 mph before entering the traffic lane.

comment.text: Check for cars and reduce your speed to 25 mph before entering the traffic lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Check for cars, increase your speed to match the flow of traffic, and merge when the way is clear.

comment.text: Check for cars, increase your speed to match the flow of traffic, and merge when the way is clear.

acceptedAnswer.text: Check for cars, increase your speed to match the flow of traffic, and merge when the way is clear.

comment.text: Check for cars, increase your speed to match the flow of traffic, and merge when the way is clear.

answerExplanation.text: Rather than stopping (as you would when entering other roads), you must use the merging or acceleration lane to speed up and smoothly merge with fast-moving traffic already on the interstate.

comment.text: When entering an interstate highway, you should: | Rather than stopping (as you would when entering other roads), you must use the merging or acceleration lane to speed up and smoothly merge with fast-moving traffic already on the interstate.

hasPart.name: Which of the following is true about roadways on bridges and overpasses in cold, wet weather?

about.name: Which of the following is true about roadways on bridges and overpasses in cold, wet weather?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following is true about roadways on bridges and overpasses in cold, wet weather? | Which of the following is true about roadways on bridges and overpasses in cold, wet weather? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Bridges and overpasses tend to freeze before the rest of the road does. They can hide spots of ice.

suggestedAnswer.text: They tend to freeze before the rest of the road does.

comment.text: They tend to freeze before the rest of the road does.

suggestedAnswer.text: They do not freeze because they are made of concrete.

comment.text: They do not freeze because they are made of concrete.

suggestedAnswer.text: They tend to freeze after the rest of the road does.

comment.text: They tend to freeze after the rest of the road does.

acceptedAnswer.text: They tend to freeze before the rest of the road does.

comment.text: They tend to freeze before the rest of the road does.

answerExplanation.text: Bridges and overpasses tend to freeze before the rest of the road does. They can hide spots of ice.

comment.text: Which of the following is true about roadways on bridges and overpasses in cold, wet weather? | Bridges and overpasses tend to freeze before the rest of the road does. They can hide spots of ice.

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: This sign warns a driver of a change in direction or a narrowing of the road. A driver may find several of these signs on the outside of a sharp curve or on approaches to a narrow bridge.

suggestedAnswer.text: Change in direction or narrowing of roadway.

comment.text: Change in direction or narrowing of roadway.
No right turn.
No passing zone.

acceptedAnswer.text: Change in direction or narrowing of roadway.

comment.text: Change in direction or narrowing of roadway.

answerExplanation.text: This sign warns a driver of a change in direction or a narrowing of the road. A driver may find several of these signs on the outside of a sharp curve or on approaches to a narrow bridge.

hasPart.name: Your license can be suspended if you are under 21 and drive with a blood alcohol level of:

about.name: Your license can be suspended if you are under 21 and drive with a blood alcohol level of:

hasPart.assesses: Your license can be suspended if you are under 21 and drive with a blood alcohol level of: | Your license can be suspended if you are under 21 and drive with a blood alcohol level of: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: There is zero tolerance for alcohol use by drivers under age 21. If you are under 21, the detection of any trace of alcohol in your system will result in stiff penalties, including the suspension of your license for two years.

comment.text: 0.15 percent or more.
0.08 percent or more.
Any amount.
Any amount.

answerExplanation.text: There is zero tolerance for alcohol use by drivers under age 21. If you are under 21, the detection of any trace of alcohol in your system will result in stiff penalties, including the suspension of your license for two years.

comment.text: Your license can be suspended if you are under 21 and drive with a blood alcohol level of: | There is zero tolerance for alcohol use by drivers under age 21. If you are under 21, the detection of any trace of alcohol in your system will result in stiff penalties, including the suspension of your license for two years.

hasPart.name: How many alcoholic drinks does it take to affect your driving ability?

about.name: How many alcoholic drinks does it take to affect your driving ability?

hasPart.assesses: How many alcoholic drinks does it take to affect your driving ability? | How many alcoholic drinks does it take to affect your driving ability? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is not advisable to drive after drinking any amount of alcohol. Even a single drink will affect your ability to drive safely.

comment.text: Three
Two
One
One

answerExplanation.text: It is not advisable to drive after drinking any amount of alcohol. Even a single drink will affect your ability to drive safely.

comment.text: How many alcoholic drinks does it take to affect your driving ability? | It is not advisable to drive after drinking any amount of alcohol. Even a single drink will affect your ability to drive safely.
